content: so my soda pop lid came off and slopped in my cup holder in the car and i thought wouldn t it be nice if i had a coaster in there to absorb all that moisture here is the result great stash buster and handy to boot these are going on a charity sale for 50¢ each i am not sure if the difference in size is that i grabbed a us g hook instead of the h or if it is just a difference in the yarn
